name: Instant Smoothing Vegan Hyaluronic Acid Hydrating Serum
about: What it is:A powerfully formulated hyaluronic acid serum to moisturize and leave skin looking radiant, smooth, and hydrated..Skin Type:Normal, Dry, Combination, and Oily.Skincare Concerns:Dryness and Uneven Texture.Highlighted Ingredients:- Triple Weight Hyaluronic Acid: A biomimetic ingredient to keep skin hydrated..Ingredient Callouts:This product is vegan, gluten-free, cruelty-free, and comes in recyclable packaging..What Else You Need to Know:This biomimetic, advanced hydration serum uses a powerful humectant found naturally in the skin. It provides skin with a moisture boost and longer-term skin support..Clinical Results:In an independent user study with 120 people, over 4 weeks:
ingredients: -Tri-Hyaluronan Complex: Delivers moisture deep into the dermis and on skinu2019s surface...Aqua/Water/Eau, Sodium Hyaluronate (*Plant/Plante), Benzyl Alcohol, Dehydroacetic Acid. (*Plant Derived/Derive des Plantes). .....The list of ingredients is subject to change, please consult the packaging of the product purchased.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Massage gently into skin, after cleansing and toning..-Use as a boosting treatment, under your daily moisturizer, or on damp skin after cleansing for instant hydration and glowing, radiant skin.

reviews.review_text: As someone always on the hunt for skincare products that deliver on their promises, I recently stumbled upon Grown Alchemist's Instant Smoothing Serum, and it has truly been a game-changer in my routine.  First and foremost, let's talk about the results. This serum lives up to its name. Upon application, it immediately starts to work its magic, leaving my skin feeling incredibly smooth and velvety. The fine lines and wrinkles that used to plague my complexion seem to vanish into thin air, replaced by a youthful radiance that I haven't seen in years. I've noticed a significant improvement in the overall texture and tone of my skin since incorporating this serum into my daily regimen.  One of the things I love most about Grown Alchemist products is their commitment to clean and natural ingredients, and this serum is no exception. Packed with potent botanical extracts and bioactive peptides, it not only delivers visible results but also nourishes and rejuvenates the skin from within. I appreciate knowing that I'm treating my skin to the best nature has to offer, without any harmful additives or chemicals.  Another standout feature of this serum is its lightweight and fast-absorbing formula. Unlike some serums that leave a greasy or sticky residue behind, this one sinks effortlessly into the skin, providing an instant burst of hydration without any heaviness. It's the perfect base for makeup, allowing for seamless application and a dewy, luminous finish that lasts all day.  In terms of packaging and presentation, Grown Alchemist once again hits the mark. The sleek and minimalist design not only looks chic on my vanity but also reflects the brand's commitment to simplicity and elegance. Plus, the pump dispenser ensures that I can easily control the amount of product I use, minimizing waste and maximizing efficiency.

reviews.review_text: Iu2019m always on the lookout for a more natural, u201ccleanu201d skincare routine. The formula of this serum is very simply and straight-forward, and itu2019s even ceritfied organic, certified toxic-free, and EWG verified (a huge green flag). I used this in the evenings before applying my regular moisturizer. It contains Hyaluronan molecules, which are meant to impart intense hydration to your skin. I tried using it in the mornings before applying my makeup, but found that my foundation and concealer just didnu2019t mix well with this, so I stuck to evenings only. Come morning, my face did look plumper and smoother. I didnu2019t notice any dramatic improvement to my fine lines and early signs of wrinkles, but it seemed like there was a bit of softening taking place. Most of all, my skin is incredibly dehydrated, so I was interested to see how this fixed the issue. In combination with my regular moisturizer and used religiously each night, my face really did look a lot more hydrated and generally just healthier after continued use of this. While a bottle of the serum is only 25mL, a little goes a long way in spreading across your face. Also worth nothing, if youu2019re expecting or hoping for a flowery scent, this wonu2019t be for you. Itu2019s by and large a fragrance-free formula, with its scent best described as being clinical-neutral. This makes it ideal for those with sensitive skin and noses, who canu2019t handle anything overwhelming.   - Product received for free from Grown Alchemist in exchange for an honest review.

reviews.review_text: I recently had the pleasure of trying out the Grown Alchemist Gentle Gel Facial Cleanser, and I must say, it has been a delightful addition to my skincare routine. I was fortunate enough to receive a sample of this product for free, and I've been using it for about two weeks now.  The packaging is sleek and minimalist, which I appreciate for its simplicity and practicality. The gel formula is fantastic, with a smooth and lightweight texture that's easy to apply and lathers up just the right amount.   One of the standout features of this cleanser is its effectiveness in removing impurities and makeup without leaving my skin feeling overly dry or tight. It's especially suitable for sensitive skin like mine, as it doesn't exacerbate any sensitivity issues.  What truly sets this product apart is its ingredient list. Grown Alchemist uses clean and natural ingredients, including soothing botanical extracts like chamomile, bergamot, and willow bark. The formula is also free from harsh chemicals and sulfates.  In conclusion, the Grown Alchemist Gentle Gel Facial Cleanser has exceeded my expectations. It combines a minimalist design with a gentle yet effective formula, making it suitable for daily use. Whether you have sensitive skin or simply prefer clean and natural skincare, this cleanser is definitely worth trying out. I can easily see myself purchasing the full-size product in the future.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I recently tried the instant smoothing serum, and I have to say, I'm really impressed with the results! The serum goes on smoothly and feels very lightweight on my skin, which is great because I don't like products that feel heavy or greasy. It also has a nice, subtle scent that isn't overpowering.  But what really impressed me was how quickly the serum worked to smooth out my skin. I have some fine lines and wrinkles around my eyes and mouth, and I noticed a significant improvement in their appearance within just a few minutes of applying the serum. My skin looked smoother, plumper, and more youthful, which was exactly what I was hoping for.  Overall, I would definitely recommend this instant smoothing serum to anyone who wants to improve the appearance of their skin quickly and easily. It's a great product that delivers real results, and I'll definitely be using it again in the future!
